column4: If you reinstall grub, it ought to be nice and write a sane menu.lst that hopefully sees Windows

Your wall of text confused me a little bit with all the Windows 7 talk, but reinstalling grub makes the most sense. If you fiddle with the MBR using a Windows app, it will not very nicely just blow grub up and not allow you to boot to Ubuntu; if you reinstall grub via Ubuntu, it should see Windows and add lines for it to /boot/grub/menu.lst
Ok, well. Thanks for your help. I'll try reinstalling GRUB and see if it gets rid of both of them ^^
